Job.Description: She will fight to the death against beasts you own. Dangerous.

GainTrait.Text: She has become pretty Tough from all the fights she's been in.
${name} has become pretty Strong from all the fights she's been in.
She is getting rather Aggressive from her enjoyment of combat.
Having to evade so many of the beasts' attacks, ${name} has gotten quite fast.
All the fighting and training has made ${name} very Muscular.

LoseTrait.Text: ${name} has had to heal from so many injuries you can't say she is Fragile anymore.

Message.Name: no-armor
Message.Text: The crowd can't believe you sent ${name} out to fight beasts without armor. But at least she had a weapon.

Message.Name: no-weapon
Message.Text: ${name} came out in armor, but didn't have a weapon.

Message.Name: no-equipment
Message.Text: The crowd can't believe you sent ${name} out to fight with neither armor nor a weapon.

Message.Name: fully-equipped
Message.Text: ${name} came out in armor and with a weapon in hand. The crowd felt she was ready for battle.

Message.Name: beast-won-horny
Message.Text: As it turns out, she seems to welcome her 'punishment' very much. The same goes for the crowd.

Message.Name: beast-won-masochist
Message.Text: Being a masochist, she doesn't actually mind.

Message.Name: beast-won-bad
Message.Text: Her screams as the beast ravishes her already battered body are bone-chilling to all but the most bloodthirsty spectators. Maybe you took this a step too far.

Message.Name: beast-kills-girl
Message.Text:
${name} proved no match for this vicious beast! You send your men in to cage it. In their attempt to get to her before it's too late, they kill the beast, but not before it mortally wounds ${name}. They can only watch helplessly as she coughs up blood with her last breaths.
If you'd had a Medic on standby, you might have been able to save her.

Message.Name: beast-wins-girl-rescued
Message.Text: ${name} proved no match for this vicious beast! As it becomes clear that it is about to kill her, your men manage to distract it long enough for a Medic to get to her.

Message.Name: beast-wins-girl-survives
Message.Text: ${name} proved no match for this vicious beast! The bloody mess your goons carry out of the arena floor barely resembles a human being, but her shallow breaths indicate that she is still alive.
